text: Maicon Pereira de Oliveira (8 May 1988 â€“ 8 February 2014) commonly known as Maicon, was a Brazilian footballer. He played for the Ukrainian club Illichivets on loan from Shakhtar Donetsk. He operated as a striker. Maicon died in a car accident in Donetsk on 8 February 2014, aged 25. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro
title: Maicon (footballer, born May 1988)
